item.description:
EMS Acton and Nashoba Valley Winery
Invite you to be our guest for a Saturday Afternoon of Snowshoeing and Wine Tasting

February 2nd from 1:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. at Nashoba Valley Winery
100 Wattaquadoc Hill Rd., Bolton, MA

Take a guided snowshoe tour through the orchard and vineyard and then warm up inside tasting wine.
While you are here you might decide to purchase one of our 20 award winning wines, handcrafted beers or distilled spirits, or gifts
from the gift shop.
Everyone of any age is welcome, except dogs and whining folks.
For more information contact EMS @ 978-263-4151 or NVW @ 978-779-5521

2008 promises to give you a variety of opportunities to come
"Taste with Us"
item.how_to_find_us: Depending on the weather, we will meetup on the front porch outside of the wine shop.
item.name: Come & Explore a Local Winery!
